product_name: Dynafit TLT Radical FT Randonee Bindings with 110mm Brakes - 2013/2014
long_description: Dynafit TLT Radical FT randonee bindings with 110mm brakes are the solution for mountaineers and freeriders who log lots of miles skinning up mountains to ski couloirs, drop cliffs and float powder.
short_description: Dynafit TLT Radical FT randonee bindings with 110mm brakes are the solution for mountaineers and freeriders who log lots of miles skinning up mountains to ski couloirs, drop cliffs and float powder.
